name: barba.js
description: Barba.js is a small (7kb minified and compressed) and easy-to-use library that helps you create smooth transitions between pages of your website. It enables your website to function like a Single Page Application (SPA) and helps reduce the delay between your pages, minimize browser HTTP requests, and improve your user's web experience.

description: Vivus is a lightweight (no dependencies) JavaScript class that allows you to animate SVGs, giving them the appearance of being drawn.
